## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [register(type, paster)](./blockly.clipboard.registry.register.md) | Registers the given paster so that it cna be used for pasting. |
|  [unregister(type)](./blockly.clipboard.registry.unregister.md) | Unregisters the paster associated with the given type. |
